type: Tutorial Step - To Infinity and Beyond

definition.text: Let's get rolling! We will be using the app.contribute command to submit your profile.

paragraphs.text: Copy the command making sure you replace the placeholder with your Github username, paste it in the search box, and click Enter.

If everything is set up correctly, you should see a message stating that your pull request has been submitted. This means that your profile has been sent to the main Superalgos repository and will be automatically merged in just a few minutes!
